book.title: An Approach via Module Theory
book.author: Adkins, William A.
book.description: This book is designed as a text for a first-year graduate algebra course. The choice of topics is guided by the underlying theme of modules as a basic unifying concept in mathematics.

book.title: Aupunti di programmazione ad oggetti
book.author: Francesco Ranzato
book.description: Perfect book for learning a object oriented programming.

book.title: GMAT strategy guide
book.author: Manhattan GMAT
book.description: A study aid to prepare for the algebra questions on the Graduate Management Admission Test (GMAT), providing practice problems and instructions on problem-solving techniques, and covering linear and quadratic equations, inequalities, roots, formulas, and related topics.

book.title: Java : a beginner's tutorial
book.author: Budi Kumiawan
book.description: A Java tutorial for beginners, covering Java SE 6

book.title: Qt for Symbian
book.author: Fitzek, Frank H. P.
book.description: The Qt environment is the new platform to make and build mobile applications. Using Qt, you can develop applications and user interfaces once, and deploy them across many desktop and embedded operating systems without rewriting the source code.
